166 class AmoebaBondForce::BondInfo {
167 public:
168  int particle1, particle2;
169  double length, quadraticK;
170  BondInfo() {
171  particle1 = particle2 = -1;
172  length = quadraticK = 0.0;
173  }
174  BondInfo(int particle1, int particle2, double length, double quadraticK) :
175  particle1(particle1), particle2(particle2), length(length), quadraticK(quadraticK) {
176  }
177 };
